plugin.name: Notes
plugin.description: PLEASE install the texture pack FIRST! A big thank you to Temporal Ranger for creating all of the in game shots! I recommend you select the gloves/boots that belong to your chest piece. You can mix and match but be sure to check in game if there are any seams. My mod MaddHaven can assist you in this.

plugin.name: View All Install Pages
plugin.description: Select this option if you would like view all the install pages (Default).

plugin.name: Select Install Pages
plugin.description: Select this option if you would like to only install certain armors. Use this if you are only wanting to update a specific armor or armors (such as after a new content update). WARNING: This will not clean old installs so some files may be left behind. It will only copy in the new files.

plugin.name: Version 1.0.0
plugin.description: This is all the options available in the initial release.

plugin.description: Bandit Page Updates

plugin.name: Version 3.0.0
plugin.description: Panty / Bra Edit / Others. Please note, almost every armor/clothing has changed so selecting this is selecting everything!

plugin.name: Version 3.1.0
plugin.description: Fix for Dark Brotherhood Gauntlets

plugin.name: Version 3.2.0
plugin.description: Fix for Fine Clothes 02

plugin.name: Version 4.0.0
plugin.description: Alternate Textures and several new clothing selections. Please note, almost every armor/clothing has changed so selecting this is selecting everything!

plugin.name: Version 4.1.0
plugin.description: Fixes for funky Stormcloak, Bar Keeper and Fine Clothes 01 Meshes.

plugin.name: Version 5.0.0
plugin.description: Updates Cross Crusade's Sexy Armor to 1.1.0.
